name: POECI
tagline: Plateforme des OSC pour l'Observation des Elections en Cote d'Ivoire
body:
### Welcome to the POECI Homepage
Using a statistically robust methodology, citizen observers will collect systematic information on the 2015 Cote D'Ivoire presidential election. This data will be used to verify the official results and to assess the quality of the process.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
